thread.title: Big expansion: Allegiant adds 2 new cities, 17 routes
thread.title_full: Big expansion: Allegiant adds 2 new cities, 17 routes

author: Ben Mutzabaugh , USA TODAY
title: Big expansion: Allegiant adds 2 new cities, 17 routes
text:
In this Thursday, May 9, 2013, photo, Allegiant jets are seen at McCarran International Airport in Las Vegas. (Photo: David Becker, AP)
Tags RW 3 CONNECT 14 TWEET 1 LINKEDIN 3 COMMENT EMAIL MORE Allegiant Air announced a major expansion Tuesday that included two new destinations and a total of 17 new nonstop routes.
The two destinations joining Allegiant's route map are San Antonio and Kansas City, Mo. Allegiant's first flights from those cities begin in mid-November, with the carrier adding three routes from each.
More broadly, the addition of San Antonio and Kansas City continue Allegiant's recent trend of moving into bigger markets.
USA TODAY
August's #avgeek gallery: 30 cool aviation photos
USA TODAY
Scenes from the Airbus A350 'demo tour' of the Americas
Allegiant historically has buttered its bread in smaller markets – places like Bangor, Maine; Grand Island, Neb.; Huntington, W. Va.; and Pasco, Wash. – with flights to mostly warm-weather destinations in Florida, California and the desert Southwest. Under that business model, Allegiant has been able to woo leisure fliers by offering nonstop flights – usually just a few times a week – to destinations its major rivals serve only with a connection and change of planes.
Allegiant's business model still puts a heavy focus on those smaller markets. But starting in 2013, Allegiant began to add larger markets to its mix . Austin, Pittsburgh, New Orleans, Oklahoma City, Memphis and Raleigh-Durham are among those joining Allegiant's network during the past two years.
USA TODAY
Quirky Allegiant Air hits jackpot on small-town America
As for the 17 new routes announced Tuesday, six of those will go to Allegiant's base at Orlando/Sanford. Elsewhere, Allegiant's base at Las Vegas gets four new routes while the Florida destinations of St. Petersburg and Punta Gorda each get three. Allegiant's Fort Lauderdale base gets one new route.
From Kansas City, Allegiant will fly to Orlando/Sanford, St. Petersburg and Punta Gorda. Allegiant's San Antonio destinations will be Fort Lauderdale, Orlando/Sanford and Las Vegas.
Scroll down for the details on all 17 of the new routes announced Tuesday:
An Allegiant Air jet flies past the Luxor Resort & Casino after taking off from McCarran International Airport in Las Vegas on May 9, 2013. While other U.S. airlines have struggled with the ups and downs of the economy and oil prices, tiny Allegiant Air has been profitable for 10 straight years. David Becker, AP Fullscreen An Allegiant Air plane flies over the New York-New York Hotel & Casino in Las Vegas. David Becker, AP Fullscreen A ground worker guides an incoming Allegiant Air jetliner at McCarran International Airport in Las Vegas. David Becker, AP Fullscreen A Southwest airplane lands next to a row of Allegiant Air jets at McCarran International Airport in Las Vegas. David Becker, AP Fullscreen A Southwest jet taxis by parked Allegiant Air planes at McCarran International Airport in Las Vegas. David Becker, AP Fullscreen Two Allegiant Air jets taxi at McCarran International Airport in Las Vegas. David Becker, AP Fullscreen Ramp agent Vince Divon retrieves gate-checked items from an Allegiant Air jet parked at McCarran International Airport in Las Vegas. David Becker, AP Fullscreen Allegiant Air Capt. Bret Whalen, left, discusses the flight plan with attendants Antron Johnson, center, and John Taylor before their flight to Laredo, Texas, at McCarran International Airport in Las Vegas. David Becker, AP Fullscreen Allegiant Air flight attendant Chris Killian prepares his passengers for the flight to Laredo, Texas, before leaving McCarran International Airport in Las Vegas. David Becker, AP Orlando/Sanford
Grand Island, Neb.: One weekly flight begin Nov. 7 (seasonal)
Kansas City: Two weekly flights begin Nov. 13
Omaha: Two weekly flights begin Nov. 5
Pittsburgh: Two weekly flights begin Nov. 5
Rochester, N.Y.: Two weekly flights begin Nov. 13
San Antonio: Two weekly flights begin Nov. 5
Las Vegas McCarran
Belleville, Ill. (MidAmerica St. Louis): Two weekly flights begin Nov. 5
Montrose/Telluride, Colo.: Two weekly flights begin Dec. 18 (seasonal)
Oklahoma City: Two weekly flights begin Nov. 5
San Antonio: Two weekly flights begin Nov. 6
St. Petersburg/Clearwater, Fla.
Appleton, Wisc.: Two weekly flights begin Nov. 6
Kansas City: Two weekly flights begin Nov. 13
Scranton/Wilkes-Barre, Pa.: Two weekly flights begin Nov. 6
Punta Gorda, Fla.
Akron-Canton, Ohio: Two weekly flights begin Nov. 4
Grand Rapids, Mich.: Two weekly flights begin Nov. 4
Kansas City: Two weekly flights begin Nov. 13
Fort Lauderdale
San Antonio: Two weekly flights begin Nov. 5
